process.name: FontRec Test 41
process.narrative: Tests font recognition by opening and reading some prepared samples in MS Paint

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

input.name: Folder
input.narrative: The folder in which to look for sub-folders

output.name: Folders
output.narrative: A collection of the sub-folders found within the folder

input.name: Font Name
input.narrative: The name of the font to be tested, as recognised by Application Manager

input.name: PNG File Path
input.narrative: The path of the png file containing the font sample to be tested

input.name: Reference Text File Path
input.narrative: The path of the txt file containing the reference text, corresponding to the png sample

input.name: Font Name
input.narrative: The name of the font to be tested, as recognised by Application Manager

input.name: PNG File Path
input.narrative: The path of the png file containing the font sample to be tested

input.name: Reference Text File Path
input.narrative: The path of the txt file containing the reference text, corresponding to the png sample

exception.detail: "The following tests did not pass: " & [Failed Tests]
"Failed to read files in folder- " & [Parent Directory] & " - was looking for the font xml file"

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

exception.detail: "Unexpected number of xml files in folder - " & [Parent Directory] & " - found " & [File Count] & " when expecting 1"

stage.name: Iterate Files to Get XML Path
Delete Unwanted Characters
stage.code:
For each ch as Char in Disallowed_Characters.ToCharArray() Input = Input.Replace(ch, "") Next
Cleaned_Text = Input

calculation.expression: Len([Text Read]) > 0 and [Clean Text Read] =[Clean Expected Text]

input.name: Folder
input.narrative: The folder in which to look for files

input.name: Patterns CSV
input.narrative: The comma seperated list of wildcard patterns

exception.detail: "Failed waiting for mspaint main window to be active"

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

output.name: Count
output.narrative: The number of rows counted in the collection

input.name: Upper Limit
input.narrative: The maximum number that may be returned (inclusive)

input.name: Number of Values
input.narrative: The number of different random numbers required

stage.name: Code1
stage.code:
Dim SB As New System.Text.StringBuilder()
Dim R As New Random() For I as integer = 1 to Number_of_Values Dim TempVal as Integer = R.Next(Upper_Limit) If Not Values.Contains(TempVal.ToString()) Then SB.Append("," & TempVal.ToString()) End If Next SB.Append(",")
Values = SB.ToString()

input.name: Upper Limit
input.narrative: The maximum number that may be returned (inclusive)

input.name: Number of Values
input.narrative: The number of different random numbers required

stage.name: Create Bitmap
stage.code:
Dim TempDir as String = Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Cookies) NewPath = System.IO.Path.Combine(TempDir, Guid.Newguid.ToString() & ".bmp")
Dim I As Image = Image.FromFile(PNG_File_Path) I.Save(NewPath, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp)

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: Win2k mspaint does not support PNG file format, so we convert to bmp and create a temporary copy
